aka: Paulinho Gogó in Top Love - Alone and in Great Company!
this_title: Top Love: Só e Bem Acompanhado!
trans_title: Paulinho Gogó in Top Love - Alone and in Great Company!
introduction: All was going well in Paulinho Gogó's life, until Nêga Juju, his beloved, leaves him. As the saying goes: bad luck in love, good luck in the game. Paulinho and his friends make fortunes through betting, yet he is not satisfied. Many twists and turns, Paulinho realizes that to be happy, he just needs to pursue his dream: play samba with his friends at his favorite bar, where he finds his new love.
chinese_title: Top Love: Só e Bem Acompanhado!
